title: Community Manager for Marketing Agency (EU-Based, Remote)
linkedin_org_slogan: Connecting Companies with the Best Global Talent #LETSGETPAIRED
linkedin_org_locations: Orange County, California, US
linkedin_org_description:
Paired is a leading headhunting agency that specializes in sourcing and recruiting top creative and design talent from overseas. We pride ourselves on our ability to identify and attract the very best candidates for our clients.

At Paired, we understand that hiring the right talent is critical to the success of any organization. That's why we take a personalized, consultative approach to the recruitment, working closely with our clients to understand their unique needs and requirements, and tailoring our search and selection process accordingly.
description_text:
Paired is a global staffing and recruiting agency that specializes in pairing remote work with top-tier talent. We help individuals from around the world connect with great companies that are looking for their specific skill set. Our mission is to provide great jobs to talented people, no matter where they are located.
Our client is seeking Community Manager to build and run Discord communities that keep top affiliates engaged, supported and selling—so our brands dominate the platform.
Responsibilities:
Set up servers, bots, roles, and permissions; audit channels for UX & compliance
Recruit high-potential affiliates, run outreach campaigns, and keep churn low
Curate winning videos, product updates, and trend reports; host live AMAs / trainings
Track creative performance via Seller Centre / KaloData; surface best angles to affiliates
Own a rolling content calendar—announcements, contests, giveaways, prize fulfilment
Liaise with brand leads; report GMV, retention, churn, and engagement weekly
Adapt quickly to new TikTok policies and client priorities


Requirements

2+ yrs community, social, or influencer-marketing management (Discord a plus)
Proven ability to grow & moderate online groups while hitting KPIs
Data-driven mindset—you spot patterns in GMV, CTR, churn and act fast
Exceptional written English
Organised, self-directed, and reliable in a remote environment


Benefits

Work from Anywhere
Competitive Salary in USD
Show more Show less

title: Ecommerce Manager (Shopify)
linkedin_org_slogan: Strapsicle - the simple one-handed strap for your Kindle & e-reader.
linkedin_org_locations: 106 Warners Ave, Bondi Beach, New South Wales 2026, AU
linkedin_org_description:
We love our Kindles.  We’ll read them in bed, on the couch, on the train, on the beach.  Anywhere and everywhere!

But as they say, love hurts.   
There’s the constant hand cramps. The neck ache.  
Plus the fear of dropping our beloved little device.

Well not anymore. 
Introducing Strapsicle™️!

In a range of funky colours, slip it on in seconds for a better reading experience.
description_text:
Strapsicle is a fast growing ecommerce business with over 180,000 customers worldwide.

We need someone to sit in our team who is solely responsible for optimising and fine-tuning our website.

The Role

You Will Be Responsible For

The Ecommerce Manager will be solely responsible for driving revenue and growth through our

Shopify website. This role will focus on day-to-day operations, strategic project management, and

ensuring a seamless customer experience. The ideal candidate will have 5-10 years of experience

in managing Shopify stores, optimizing for conversions, and executing strategies that elevate online

sales.

Key Responsibilities

Oversee all aspects of the Shopify store, ensuring it runs smoothly on a day-to-day basis.
Drive revenue growth through strategic project management, including optimizing the user

experience and increasing conversion rates.

Implement and monitor key performance indicators to track the success of online sales,

ensuring continuous growth.

Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and execute strategies for product

launches, promotions, and online campaigns.

Conduct detailed analysis of website performance, identify areas for improvement, and

implement actionable changes to enhance sales and customer experience.

Work closely with content creators and developers to ensure the website is consistently

updated and optimized for both user experience and SEO.

Stay up-to-date with e-commerce trends, tools, and best practices to bring innovative

ideas to the team.

Ideal Profile

5-10 years of proven experience in managing and growing Shopify stores, with a strong

track record of increasing conversions and sales.

Strong knowledge of e-commerce operations, including product listings, inventory

management, and customer service.

Expertise in Shopify and Shopify apps, with a deep understanding of platform capabilities

and limitations.

Strong knowledge of Content Management System (CMS) and analytical tool Google

Analytics, Adwords to track and optimize website performance.

Experience with website optimization, A/B testing, and conversion rate optimization (CRO).
Proven experience in seamlessly integrating a wide range of third-party apps and tools with

Shopify to enhance store functionality, including payment gateways, inventory

management, analytics, and marketing tools.

Expertise in customizing Shopify themes using Liquid, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to tailor

the appearance and functionality of the store to meet specific business needs and create a

unique, branded experience.

What's on Offer?

Strong opportunities to progress your career
Flexible working options
Join a market leader within Ecommerce / Marketplaces
Show more Show less
ai_benefits: Strong Opportunities To Progress Your Career
ai_core_responsibilities: The Ecommerce Manager will oversee all aspects of the Shopify store, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations and driving revenue growth. This includes optimizing the user experience, increasing conversion rates, and collaborating with the marketing team on strategies for product launches and online campaigns.
ai_requirements_summary: The ideal candidate should have 5-10 years of experience managing Shopify stores with a strong track record in increasing conversions and sales. They should possess expertise in Shopify, website optimization, and integrating third-party apps, along with strong analytical skills.

title: Sales Support Specialist
linkedin_org_locations: Claude Debussylaan 80-134, Amsterdam, 1082 MD, NL
linkedin_org_description:
We are Versuni. 

Home to some of the world’s most renowned home appliance brands. Our purpose is turning houses into homes. 

As a house of brands, we are home to the brands: Philips, Philips Baristina, Saeco, Gaggia, Preethi, Philips Walita, L’OR Barista and Senseo. 

With more than 900 patents on our name, our portfolio spans kitchen appliances, coffee, climate, garment, and floor care. 

Versuni is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and we have innovation, manufacturing, and commercial centers across the globe, with a footprint in over 100 countries.
description_text:
About The Role

The Sales Support Specialist is responsible for executing and coordinating a wide range of administrative and commercial operations that support the sales function. This includes budgeting, promotional program documentation, pricing coordination, and contract handling. The role ensures the accurate and timely execution of sales-enabling processes while maintaining compliance, transparency, and cross-functional alignment with internal and external stakeholders.

The Impact You’ll Make

Budget Management & Reconciliation:

Reconcile daily, weekly, and monthly trade investment data, including actual sales claims, rebates, and others funds.
Maintain and update master Sell-In data based on sales reports.
Managing Program Promotions Budgeting

Program Promotions Administration

Draft and coordinate approvals of trade program proposals, letters, and others documents for promotional programs.
Upload and manage documents via SAP and Docusign platforms.
Schedule and facilitate Trade Promotions Meetings (quarterly and ad-hoc) for program validation.

General Sales Administration

Process travel expense reconciliation and create purchase orders for planned budgets.
Support audit-related documentation and administrative needs of the sales team.

Pricing Management

Prepare and consolidate pricing drafts for multiple channels (TR, MR, ECOM, B2B).
Coordinate internal approval with Marketing and DL before final release to the sales team.
Ensure price documentation is version-controlled and archived.

Contract & Agreement Support

Draft sales agreements and gather feedback from stakeholders and distributors.
Submit finalized agreements via Docusign for execution and manage storage in shared systems.
Prepare LOA and termination letters as needed in coordination with all stake holders

The Skills And Knowledge You’ll Bring

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Marketing, or related field
Technical Skills:
Advanced skills in Microsoft Excel, Word, and PowerPoint is a must
Familiarity with TIT, Docusign, Ariba, and internal reporting tools is preferred
Language: Fluent in English (written and spoken) is a must
Core Competencies:
Meticulous attention to detail and data accuracy
Strong organizational and project management skills
Able to work effectively with cross-functional teams in a fast-paced environment
Ready to make an impact?

From developing game-changing air fryers to perfecting the art of coffee making, Versuni’s purpose is turning houses into homes — and we’re calling on your talent to bring it to life. Join our global team of 6,000+ passionate individuals, work with world-class brands, and shape the future of home living. We’re ready for you — are you ready for us? 
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: The Sales Support Specialist executes and coordinates administrative and commercial operations that support the sales function, including budgeting, promotional program documentation, pricing coordination, and contract handling. This role ensures accurate and timely execution of sales-enabling processes while maintaining compliance and alignment with stakeholders.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates should have a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Marketing, or a related field, along with advanced skills in Microsoft Excel, Word, and PowerPoint. Familiarity with tools like Docusign and Ariba is preferred, and fluency in English is required.

title: External Communication Manager
linkedin_org_locations: 200 E. Randolph St., Suite 7600, Chicago, IL 60601, US
linkedin_org_description:
The Kraft Heinz Company is one of the largest food and beverage companies in the world, with eight $1 billion+ brands and global sales of approximately $25 billion. We’re a globally trusted producer of high-quality, great-tasting, and nutritious foods for over 150 years. While Kraft Heinz is co-headquartered in Chicago and Pittsburgh, our brands are truly global, with products produced and marketed in over 40 countries. These beloved products include condiments and sauces, cheese and dairy, meals, meats, refreshment beverages, coffee, infant and nutrition products, and numerous other grocery products in a portfolio of more than 200 legacy and emerging brands.

We spark joy around mealtime with our iconic brands, including Kraft, Oscar Mayer, Heinz, Philadelphia, Lunchables, Velveeta, Maxwell House, Capri Sun, Ore-Ida, Kool-Aid, Jell-O, Primal Kitchen, and Classico, among others. 

No matter the brand, we’re united under one vision: To sustainably grow by delighting more consumers globally. Bringing this vision to life is our team of 37,000+ food lovers, creative thinkers, and high performers worldwide. Together, we help provide meals to those in need through our global partnership with Rise Against Hunger. We also stand committed to responsible, sustainable practices that extend to every facet of our business, our consumers, and our communities. Every day, we’re transforming the food industry with bold thinking and unprecedented results. If you share our passion – and are ready to create the future, build a legacy, and lead as a global citizen – there’s only one thing to do: join our table and let’s make life delicious!
description_text:
Job Description

Key Responsibilities 

Develop and Execute External Communications Strategy Create and implement a comprehensive external communications strategy that promotes and protects the company's identity and reputation, aligning with KHC's Global Comms strategy as well as Indonesia business strategy.
Build and Maintain Media Relationships Foster impactful engagement with key targeted media outlets and other relevant external stakeholders to establish long-term relationships and trust
Risk Management and Crisis Communications Develop and implement a risk management strategy to mitigate potential reputational risks and crises that could threaten the company's and brand's reputation.
Event Management Organize and execute external communication/PR events in collaboration with internal stakeholders and external agencies (PR agency, Event Organizer) to promote the company's reputation, brand and values.
Communication Kits & Guides Assist and prepare comprehensive communication kits for external speaking engagements and media interactions to ensure consistent and positive media coverage. (briefing documents, press release, presentations, speeches, and other external communication materials)
Company Spokesperson Serve as the company spokesperson, responding to media inquiries and representing the company in a professional and timely manner.
Media Monitoring and Analysis Manage and analyze media coverage across various channels, including conventional media, social media, and external publications, to track brand reputation and identify areas for risks and improvement.
Budget Management Oversee the external communications budget, ensuring alignment with the company's direction and business focuses.


Position Requirement

Education Background 

Public Relations / Communications, Marketing Communication, Media / Journalism

Working Experience

8+ years working experience in the communications field.
Extensive experience in leading the development, management and delivery of Corporate Communication strategies and plans.
Experience in media management, including sound understanding of social and digital media communications & crisis communications.
Ability to conceptualize, analyze and evaluate information to develop practical solutions and make informed decisions.


Skills

Technical Skills 

Corporate writing skills
Public speaking and presentation
Media relations & media events


Other Specific Requirements

Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Fluent in English, and local language will be a must.


Location(s)

Menara Mandiri

Kraft Heinz is an Equal Opportunity Employer – Underrepresented Ethnic Minority Groups/Women/Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity and other protected classes. 
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: The External Communication Manager will develop and execute a comprehensive external communications strategy to promote and protect the company's identity and reputation. They will also serve as the company spokesperson and manage media relationships to ensure positive coverage.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates should have a background in Public Relations, Communications, or related fields with over 8 years of experience in communications. Strong skills in corporate writing, public speaking, and media relations are essential.

linkedin_org_description:
Singapore-headquartered TDCX provides transformative digital CX solutions, enabling world-leading and disruptive brands to acquire new customers, to build customer loyalty, and to protect their online communities. 

TDCX helps clients achieve their customer experience aspirations by harnessing technology, human intelligence, and its global footprint. It serves clients in fintech, gaming, technology, travel and hospitality, digital advertising and social media, streaming and e-commerce. TDCX’s expertise and strong footprint in Asia have made it a trusted partner for clients, particularly high-growth, new economy companies, looking to tap the region’s growth potential.

TDCX’s commitment to delivering positive outcomes for our clients extends to its role as a responsible corporate citizen. Its Corporate Social Responsibility program focuses on positively transforming the lives of its people, its communities, and the environment.

TDCX employs more than 19,000 employees across 34 campuses globally, specifically in Brazil, Colombia, Hong Kong, India, Japan, Malaysia, Mainland China, Philippines, Türkiye, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Thailand, Türkiye, and Vietnam. For more information, please visit www.tdcx.com.
description_text:
#BeMore 
Do you aspire for a rewarding career that lets you do more and achieve more? Unleash your full potential at work with TDCX, an award-winning and fast-growing BPO company.
Work with the world’s most loved brands and be with awesome, diverse people. Be home, belong, and start your journey to #BeMore!
Top Reasons to work with TDCX 
Attractive remuneration, great perks
Comprehensive medical, insurance, or social security coverage
World-class workspaces
Engaging activities and recognition programs
Strong learning and development plans for your career growth
Positive culture for you to #BeMore at work
Easy to locate area with direct access to public transport
Flexible working arrangements
Be coached and mentored by experts in your field
Join a global company, winner of hundreds of industry awards
What is your mission? 
Work closely with hiring managers to understand their recruiting and selection requirements in order to meet hiring needs on a timely basis.
Responsible for the complete cycle of recruitment from sourcing, job advertising, resume screening, interviewing to deliver headcount targets.
Adopting effective and innovative methods of recruitment in order to deliver headcount targets.
Participate in recruitment marketing programmes i.e. career talks and job fairs.
Prepare recruitment reports in order to monitor and assess effectiveness of recruitment strategies.
Prepare and complete the recruitment administrative functions.
Ability to ask the right questions to the candidate.
Foster a deal in selling the best talent to the hiring managers and selling the best talent on the job.
Work closely with HR representatives or company leaders to ensure that their alternative solution adheres to their organization's budget and policies.
Any other duties and responsibilities that may be assigned to you by the management from time to time, within your category of employment in the organization and for the effective implementation, maintenance and continual improvement of the Quality Management System of TDCX.
Who are we looking for? 
Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree in any field.
Candidates must have a minimum of 2 years' experience in the recruitment and selection. However, fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
Proven ability to source, screen, recruit, recommend strong talent and strong relationship-builder.
Possess the accountability and personal responsibility to own and drive results.
Exhibit the highest degree of professionalism and integrity.
Proven ability to work under pressure while maintaining a positive team attitude.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and the language of supporting market
Who is TDCX? 
Singapore-based TDCX is a global business process outsourcing (BPO) leader, offering advanced customer experience (CX) solutions, sales and digital marketing services, and content moderation. It caters to industries such as digital advertising, social media, e-commerce, fintech, gaming, healthtech, media, technology, and travel & hospitality.
TDCX’s smart, scalable approach—driven by innovation and operational precision—positions it as a key partner for companies targeting tangible outcomes. With more than 20,000 employees across 39 locations worldwide, TDCX delivers robust coverage across Asia, Europe, and the U.S.
Visit www.tdcx.com for more info.
Show more Show less

title: Operations Specialist
linkedin_org_slogan: People driven. Ride for a fair price you both agree on. This is our inner drive.
linkedin_org_locations: Mountain View, California 94040, US
linkedin_org_description:
inDrive is a global mobility and urban services platform. The inDrive app has been downloaded over 280 million times, and has been the second most downloaded mobility app for the third consecutive year. In addition to ride-hailing, inDrive provides an expanding list of urban services, including intercity transportation and delivery. In 2023, inDrive launched New Ventures, a venture and M&A arm. 

inDrive operates in 888 cities in 48 countries. Driven by its mission of challenging social injustice, the company is committed to having a positive impact on the lives of one billion people by 2030. It pursues this goal both through its core business, which supports local communities via a fair pricing model; and through the work of inVision, its non-profit arm. inVision’s community empowerment programs help to advance education, sports, arts and sciences, gender equality and other vital initiatives. 

For more information visit www.inDrive.com
description_text:
We are looking for a highly motivated and proactive Global Operations Specialist to support our operations in Indonesia. This is a hands-on, dynamic role that requires operational excellence, strong ownership, and the ability to work independently without the need for micromanagement.
As part of the APAC Operations team, you will be the go-to person for ensuring smooth and efficient offices and travel support in Indonesia. You will work closely with local teams, vendors, and cross-functional stakeholders to anticipate needs, solve problems, and continuously improve processes.

Responsibilities
Own and manage daily operational processes in Indonesia (e.g., office operations, travel coordination, vendor management, documentation, procurement, etc.)
Offices opening, movings, closures
Identify inefficiencies and propose solutions without waiting to be asked
Take initiative to improve local operations and implement best practices in collaboration with the regional team
Act as a local partner for business stakeholders, ensuring their operational needs are met with speed and quality
Coordinate with vendors and service providers, ensuring high standards of performance and cost-effectiveness
Keep internal documentation and trackers up to date and accurate
Contribute to regional initiatives and cross-country collaboration efforts
Support crisis management and ensure business continuity at the local level
Provide local support to HQ and regional teams in organizing business events, team gatherings, and external meetings
Coordinate visits of senior leadership and other key stakeholders, including travel arrangements, on-site logistics, and office readiness
Book and manage external venues such as conference rooms, meeting spaces, or event locations as needed
Qualifications
2–4 years of experience in operations, administration, or similar roles
Experience in facility operations, offices openings, travel support
Proven ability to work independently and take ownership of tasks
Strong problem-solving skills and a solution-oriented mindset
Excellent organizational and communication skills
Comfortable working in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment
A proactive attitude — you see a problem and act on it
Fluent English
Nice to Have
Experience working in a global or regional operations team
Familiarity with procurement, vendor management, and office space management
Interest in business processes and improving efficiency
Background in supporting remote or hybrid team
Conditions & Benefits
Hybrid work schedule
Unlimited opportunities for professional and career growth, regular external and internal training from our partners
The opportunity to become part of an international team of professionals who create one of the greatest success stories in the global IT industry
Probation period up to 3 months
We offer you all the conditions for professional and personal growth with a rapidly growing tech company. Your resume will be considered within 14 calendar days of receiving it. If your experience meets the requirements of our company, we will contact you.
If you receive no feedback, it means that currently there are no suitable vacancies for you.
Show more Show less
ai_benefits: Unlimited Opportunities for Professional and Career Growth
ai_core_responsibilities: Manage daily operational processes in Indonesia, including office operations and travel coordination. Act as a local partner for business stakeholders to ensure their operational needs are met efficiently.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates should have 2-4 years of experience in operations or administration and possess strong problem-solving and organizational skills. A proactive attitude and the ability to work independently are essential.

title: Master Teacher Coach English Academy - Jakarta Barat - Kemanggisan
linkedin_org_slogan: Empower enterprises with end-to-end learning solutions. Together, we drive growth, inspire talent & workplaces!
linkedin_org_locations: Jl. Dr. Saharjo No.161, Manggarai Selatan, Tebet, Jakarta Selatan, DKI Jakarta 12860, ID
linkedin_org_description:
Ruangguru for Business adalah unit bisnis di Ruangguru, perusahaan teknologi pendidikan terbesar di Asia Tenggara. Ruangguru for Business telah dipercaya oleh lebih dari 500 perusahaan di lebih dari 40 industri di Indonesia melalui Learning Management System dan solusi pelatihan lainnya untuk meningkatkan kompetensi hard skill maupun soft skill karyawan. 

Kunjungi www.ruangkerja.id sekarang juga!
description_text:
English Academy is seeking dedicated and experienced full-time English Teachers in Selong to join our team. The ideal candidates will not only excel in teaching English to students of various age groups but will also mentor freelance teachers to ensure their teaching methods align with English Academy’s high standards.

Teaching

Job Descriptions:

Plan and deliver high-quality English lessons to students ranging from young learners to adults. Maximum 25 teaching hours per week. 
Develop engaging and interactive lesson plans that cater to the needs and proficiency levels of students. 
Utilize a variety of teaching techniques and materials to facilitate learning and encourage student participation. 
Provide constructive feedback and support to students to help them achieve their learning goals. 
Assess and monitor students' progress, providing regular reports and updates. 

Class Administration

Maintain accurate records of student attendance, progress, and performance. 
Prepare and administer tests, quizzes, and other assessment tools. 
Collaborate with administrative staff to ensure smooth operation of classes and adherence to schedules. 
Handle classroom management, ensuring a positive and conducive learning environment. 

Mentorship

Mentor and support freelance teachers, providing guidance on lesson planning, classroom management, and teaching techniques. 
Conduct regular observations of freelance teachers' classes, offering feedback and actionable advice to improve their teaching performance. 
Ensure freelance teachers adhere to English Academy's teaching standards and policies. 

Job Requirements

Bachelor's degree in English, Education, or a related field
TEFL, TESOL, or CELTA certification. 
Minimum of 2 years of teaching experience, preferably in an ESL/EFL context. 
Proven ability to mentor and support other teachers. 
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 
Strong organizational and time-management abilities. 
Commitment to continuous professional development and staying updated with the latest teaching methodologies.
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: The Master Teacher Coach will plan and deliver high-quality English lessons to students of various age groups while mentoring freelance teachers. Responsibilities include developing lesson plans, assessing student progress, and ensuring adherence to teaching standards.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates must have a Bachelor's degree in English, Education, or a related field, along with TEFL, TESOL, or CELTA certification. A minimum of 2 years of teaching experience and proven mentoring abilities are required.

description_text:
English Academy is seeking dedicated and experienced full-time English Teachers in Selong to join our team. The ideal candidates will not only excel in teaching English to students of various age groups but will also mentor freelance teachers to ensure their teaching methods align with English Academy’s high standards.

Teaching

Job Descriptions:

Plan and deliver high-quality English lessons to students ranging from young learners to adults. Maximum 25 teaching hours per week. 
Develop engaging and interactive lesson plans that cater to the needs and proficiency levels of students. 
Utilize a variety of teaching techniques and materials to facilitate learning and encourage student participation. 
Provide constructive feedback and support to students to help them achieve their learning goals. 
Assess and monitor students' progress, providing regular reports and updates. 

Class Administration

Maintain accurate records of student attendance, progress, and performance. 
Prepare and administer tests, quizzes, and other assessment tools. 
Collaborate with administrative staff to ensure smooth operation of classes and adherence to schedules. 
Handle classroom management, ensuring a positive and conducive learning environment. 

Mentorship

Mentor and support freelance teachers, providing guidance on lesson planning, classroom management, and teaching techniques. 
Conduct regular observations of freelance teachers' classes, offering feedback and actionable advice to improve their teaching performance. 
Ensure freelance teachers adhere to English Academy's teaching standards and policies. 

Job Requirements

Bachelor's degree in English, Education, or a related field
TEFL, TESOL, or CELTA certification. 
Minimum of 2 years of teaching experience, preferably in an ESL/EFL context. 
Proven ability to mentor and support other teachers. 
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 
Strong organizational and time-management abilities. 
Commitment to continuous professional development and staying updated with the latest teaching methodologies.
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: The Master Teacher Coach will plan and deliver high-quality English lessons while mentoring freelance teachers to align their methods with the Academy's standards. Responsibilities include developing lesson plans, assessing student progress, and maintaining classroom management.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates must have a Bachelor's degree in English, Education, or a related field, along with TEFL, TESOL, or CELTA certification. A minimum of 2 years of teaching experience and proven mentoring abilities are required.

linkedin_org_description: Aeris Beauté is one of the fastest-growing beauty start-ups in Indonesia. We are curious, innovative, obsessed with quality, and devoted to our customers.
description_text:
We’re Hiring: Head of Marketing – Aeris Beauté

Location: Jakarta, Indonesia
Employment Type : Full-Time
Reports To: Chief Business Officer
Team Leadership: Leads a multidisciplinary marketing team

About Aeris Beauté
Aeris Beauté is a modern Indonesian beauty brand rooted in wellness, simplicity, and conscious living. We focus on developing skin-caring makeup and multi-functional personal care products powered by superfood-based formulas. Since our launch, Aeris has become a go-to brand for individuals who seek quality, purpose-driven beauty products designed for real, everyday life. We’re on a mission to inspire more people to feel good in their own skin—with clean ingredients, thoughtful design, and empowering storytelling.

About the Role
Aeris Beauté is looking for a strategic and inspiring Head of Marketing to lead the next chapter of our brand growth. This role will drive the development and execution of our brand strategy, overseeing integrated marketing, digital performance, brand communications, and partnerships to accelerate business results and elevate Aeris’ presence in Indonesia’s beauty market.

Key Responsibilities

Brand Strategy & Management
Develop and execute brand strategy that aligns with Aeris’ vision and growth goals.
Maintain brand consistency and narrative across all channels and materials.
Identify and respond to market trends and opportunities to strengthen positioning.

Campaign Planning & Execution
Lead end-to-end 360° marketing campaigns across digital, in-store, and media.
Collaborate with product and sales teams to ensure marketing strategies support commercial priorities.
Analyze performance metrics and optimize campaigns for effectiveness and ROI.

Brand Communications & Partnerships
Oversee PR strategy and execution, media relations, and influencer collaborations
Build and maintain partnerships with key stakeholders that amplify brand equity and reach.
Maximize earned media value through compelling storytelling and brand activations.

Digital & Social Media Marketing
Define digital and social strategies, including paid media and content pillars.
Drive content planning and performance across owned digital channels.
Oversee campaign analytics and refine approaches based on audience behavior and KPIs.

Market Research & Insights
Lead consumer and competitive research to uncover insights that shape brand direction.
Use data to support product positioning, messaging, and innovation strategies.

Budget Management
Manage and allocate the annual marketing budget effectively.
Track spending, forecast usage, and report on ROI for each marketing initiative.

Team Leadership & Collaboration
Mentor and lead a growing marketing team.
Collaborate across departments (product, commercial, finance, operations) to ensure strategic alignment.
Build a culture of accountability, innovation, and high performance.

What We’re Looking For
8+ years of progressive marketing experience, with 3+ years in a leadership role.
Strong track record in building brand strategy and integrated campaigns.
Experience in beauty, consumer goods, or lifestyle categories preferred.
Strong analytical, leadership, and stakeholder management skills.
Creative thinker with a data-driven mindset.
Excellent communication and cross-functional collaboration abilities.

If you are a brand-builder at heart and ready to lead the marketing vision of one of Indonesia’s most loved beauty brands, we’d love to hear from you.
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: The Head of Marketing will develop and execute brand strategy, oversee integrated marketing efforts, and lead a multidisciplinary marketing team. This role focuses on driving brand growth and elevating Aeris Beauté's presence in the beauty market through effective campaigns and partnerships.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates should have 8+ years of progressive marketing experience, including 3+ years in a leadership role. A strong track record in building brand strategy and integrated campaigns, particularly in the beauty or consumer goods sectors, is preferred.

linkedin_org_description:
Traveloka is Southeast Asia’s leading all-in-one travel platform connecting millions globally with trusted, world-class experiences. Founded in 2012, Traveloka has operations in Australia, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, and Vietnam. With over 140 million app downloads and more than 40 million monthly active users, Traveloka stands as one of the most popular travel apps in the region.

Traveloka's mission is to revolutionize the travel and lifestyle industry by providing seamless, user-friendly solutions for booking flights, hotels, and experiences. We want to empower travelers with a comprehensive platform that simplifies trip planning and enhances the overall travel experience. By leveraging cutting-edge technology and a customer-centric approach, Traveloka aims to redefine the way people explore and connect with the world, making travel more accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
description_text:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!

‎

‎

Job Description

Define product roadmap and strategy to address user needs and achieve business goals. 
Define business KPIs and success metrics and is accountable to measure product success and contributions.
Understand user needs and translate those into product requirements by taking into consideration the business goals, development cost & technical debt that might incur.
Build relationships with stakeholders across the organization to understand and prioritize needs across use cases and also short & long-term time horizons.
Work with cross-functional teams on the ideation, research, design, development and launch of user-centric products. 
Plan and manage multiple projects based on the level of urgency and importance of the projects.
Leveraging experiments, quantitative and qualitative user insights to make data-informed and data-driven decisions.
Communicate well and influence stakeholders to prioritize their works in the interest of shared benefits or agreed business needs.
Provide recommendations on business process improvement and operational guidelines.

‎

Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or other technical fields from top local or overseas universities with strong academic results, MBA is a plus
3-5 years of prior experience as a Product Manager with a proven track record of successfully owning and delivering products that address market needs and drive business growth
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with proven ability to identify root causes and potential solutions that could be in the form of remedies / course-corrective actions and/or innovative solutions that solve fundamental pain points faced in the market
Team player with solid communication and stakeholder management skills to drive various growth projects
A quick learner to absorb new knowledge in the fast-changing and dynamic industry, synthesize learnings to strategic growth levers that generate tangible business impacts
A strong drive to make things happen, charisma, and ability to influence in a multicultural setting
Passion in making the world better through technology
Willing to do business trip frequently; at least once/month

‎

If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us! 
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: Define product roadmap and strategy to address user needs and achieve business goals. Work with cross-functional teams on the ideation, research, design, development, and launch of user-centric products.
ai_requirements_summary: Bachelor's degree in a technical field and 3-5 years of experience as a Product Manager are required. Candidates should possess excellent analytical skills and the ability to communicate effectively with stakeholders.

title: Vice President Network People and Talent Development
linkedin_org_description: Opening up a world of opportunity for our customers, investors, ourselves and the planet. We're a financial services organisation that serves more than 40 million customers, ranging from individual savers and investors to some of the world’s biggest companies and governments. Our network covers 64 countries and territories, and we’re here to use our unique expertise, capabilities, breadth and perspectives to open up a world of opportunity for our customers. HSBC is listed on the London, Hong Kong, New York, Paris and Bermuda stock exchanges. To view our social media terms and conditions please visit the following webpage: http://www.hsbc.com/social-TandCs
description_text:
Job ID: 276675

Location: Jakarta, Indonesia

Area of interest: Branch and Retail Banking

Job type: Permanent - Full Time

Work style: Hybrid Working

Opening date: 11-Jul-2025

Closing date: 11-Aug-2025

Job Advert Details

Some Careers Shine Brighter Than Others.

If you’re looking for a role that will help you stand out at HSBC, take a look at how you can fulfil your potential.

Within International Wealth and Premier Banking (IWPB), we serve 41 million customers globally, including 6.7 million who are international, from retail customers to ultra high net worth individuals and their families. We help our customers look after their day-to-day finances and manage, protect and grow their wealth. Our wealth management teams provide financial planning and advice and market insight and updates, as well as products in areas such as investments, deposits, insurance, financing and foreign exchange. They include relationship managers, who work to understand the financial needs of clients and create strategies to meet their objectives, as well as technical product experts, sales managers and support staff

We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join this team in the role of Vice President Network People and Talent Development.

Responsibilities: 

Create initiative to support Network strategy to achieve FRP in term of people development/talent management/FTE fulfillment 
Responsible to ensure the capacity of Network branches in fulfill as per FTE plan 
To develop training program to ensure all branches staff have the right capability, skill and knowledge to able perform their role with effective and optimize
Ensure network staff to have certification in compliance with regulatory and internal policy.
To continuous have initiative to build Network as best place to work

Qualifications

To be successful in this role, you should meet the following requirements:

This position requirement a candidate with working experience above 10 years in banking industry especially in retail banking & wealth management, passionate in building staff capability, able to collaborate with branch leaders and business with excellent communication skills and leadership as well.

You’ll achieve more at HSBC

HSBC is committed to building a culture where all employees are valued, respected and every opinion counts. We take pride in providing a workplace that fosters professional development, flexible working, and opportunities to grow within an inclusive and diverse environment. We want everyone to achieve their potential with equality regardless of gender, ethnicity, disability, religion, age, or any other trait protected by applicable law. If you need any support or have any access requirements, we encourage you to inform us through email at recruitment.hrd@hsbc.co.id at the time of your application, so that we can support you through your recruitment journey 
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: The Vice President Network People and Talent Development will create initiatives to support the Network strategy for people development and talent management. They will also ensure that branch staff have the necessary skills and certifications to perform effectively.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates should have over 10 years of experience in the banking industry, particularly in retail banking and wealth management. They must be passionate about building staff capability and possess excellent communication and leadership skills.

title: Client Relations Specialist
linkedin_org_slogan: Talent Acquisition and Manpower Management Services
linkedin_org_description: Our tailored recruitment services are designed to find the perfect fit for your company culture and business needs, ensuring you attract and retain top talent who will drive your success.
description_text:
One of our client a compressed natural gas company is looking for client relation specialist : 

Job Description: 
Act as the first point of contact for front-facing customer interactions, providing prompt and courteous assistance.
Ensure accurate and timely processing and disbursement of customer invoices.
Conduct regular customer visits to strengthen relationships, address concerns, and gather feedback.
Maintain open communication with clients to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction.
Resolve issues related to billing, service delivery, or customer inquiries in a professional and efficient manner.
Monitor and follow up on the status of invoices to ensure smooth workflow and timely payment.
Maintain detailed records of customer interactions, transactions, and feedback.
Support the retention and satisfaction of existing customers through attentive service and problem resolution.
Collaborate with internal departments (e.g., accounting, sales) to ensure customer needs are met effectively.

Qualifications: 
Hold bachelor’s degree in Business, Communications, or a related field is a plus.
Must have experience as customer service specialized in B2B Industry at least 3 to 5 years, preferably in compressed natural gas solution or energy.
Prior experience in customer service with client-facing roles, preferably in a billing or invoicing environment.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Strong organizational and time management abilities.
Attention to detail with a focus on accuracy.
Work Environment: Office-based with some travel for customer visits.
Must hold a valid motorcyle driving license (SIM C).

description_text:
Kami mencari Business Manager (Team Leader) yang berpengalaman untuk memimpin dan mengawasi pekerjaan karyawan di perusahaan kami. Tugas utama adalah bertanggung jawab untuk memastikan efisiensi operasi bisnis serta menetapkan tujuan strategis kedepannya. Selain itu juga harus memiliki kompetensi memberikan bimbingan untuk peningkatan kinerja, dengan cara yang menggabungkan visi dan budaya perusahaan. Tujuannya adalah untuk memastikan profitabilitas kegiatan perusahaan kami untuk mendorong pembangunan berkelanjutan dan kesuksesan jangka panjang.

Tanggungjawab Kerja:

Melakukan monitoring terhadap tim marketing/business partner dalam hal kinerja dan pencapaian target
Melakukan market review dan menjalankan strategi untuk mencapai target yang ditetapkan
Bertanggung jawab atas proses bisnis dalam hal SOP, baik secara administrasi maupun di lapangan
Bertanggung jawab atas portofolio cabang/point secara kualitas dan kuantitas
Bertanggung jawab atas soliditas tim dan mampu me-manage konflik internal tim atas dasar peraturan perusahaan

Requirements

Pendidikan terakhir minimum Diploma
Memiliki pengalaman bertanggung jawab dalam memimpin tim min 2th
Berpengalaman memimpin lebih dari 5-10 anggota tim
Memiliki pengalaman min 2 tahun di Micro Finance sebagai Manager (Lembaga Keuangan Sistem Grameen diutamakan)
Dapat menyusun strategi sales & marketing sebagai paduan tim untuk mencapai target
Mempunyai motor dan SIM C
Bersedia ditempatkan di Jiwan

Kemampuan yang Dibutuhkan:

Disiplin Tinggi (berintegritas, jujur & transparan)
Memiliki kekuatan komunikasi & berkolaborasi dengan tim
Memiliki semangat belajar yg tinggi terutama untuk menganalisa informasi dan data
Mudah beradaptasi pada perubahan dan berorientasi pada target
Mampu membangun budaya coaching untuk meningkatkan performa tim

title: Senior Supply Chain Manager
linkedin_org_slogan: Official page of FOOM Lab Global, Indonesian based tech-enabled consumer electronics product startup.
linkedin_org_locations: Jl. TB Simatupang No.Kav. 36, RT.1/RW.15, Cilandak Bar., Kec. Cilandak, Soverign Plaza, Jakarta Selatan, DKI Jakarta 12430, ID
Jl. Kp. Kadu Suka Mulya, Bunder, Kec. Cikupa, Pergudangan Indoserena Tahap 1, Kabupaten Tangerang, Banten 15710, ID
linkedin_org_description: Founded in 2019, Foom Lab is a leading e-cigarettes brand in Indonesia. Foom Lab Global is on a mission to convert adult smokers away from combustible tobacco products, eliminate their use, and prevent underage usage of our products.
description_text:
Job Summary:
FOOM is looking for an experienced Senior Supply Chain Manager with a proven track record in building and scaling manufacturing facilities. This role will be pivotal in optimizing the end-to-end supply chain operations. The ideal candidate is not overly technical, but understands the full manufacturing ecosystem, has led large operational teams, and brings strategic thinking and business acumen to the table.

Key Responsibilities:
Lead and manage end-to-end supply chain functions: demand planning, procurement, production flow, warehouse, and logistics.
Oversee factory supply operations including raw materials, WIP, and FG flows.
Drive cost efficiency and operational excellence in material sourcing, inventory, and supplier management.
Ensure seamless integration between production scheduling and material readiness.
Collaborate closely with Production, QA/QC, and Engineering to align output with demand plans.
Strategically source related materials and components from both local and regional suppliers.
Lead supply chain strategy during factory setup, relocation, or greenfield build-outs.
Develop and manage a strong team across planning, warehousing, and sourcing functions.
Maintain strong vendor relationships and negotiate terms to maximize value.
Work closely with leadership on business-driven decision-making and capacity planning.
Implement and improve systems, SOPs, and KPIs for measurable outcomes.

Qualifications:
Minimum 6 years of experience in supply chain operations
Proven experience in greenfield factory projects (must-have).
Strong leadership background with experience managing large teams across functions.
Exposure to local manufacturing setups with export operations is a plus.
Fluent in Bahasa Indonesia and English; Mandarin/Chinese proficiency is a plus.
Strong understanding of production planning, procurement, and distribution flows.
Ability to operate independently, with a business and growth mindset.
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: Lead and manage end-to-end supply chain functions including demand planning, procurement, production flow, warehouse, and logistics. Collaborate closely with various departments to ensure alignment between production scheduling and material readiness.
ai_requirements_summary: The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 6 years of experience in supply chain operations and proven experience in greenfield factory projects. Strong leadership skills and fluency in Bahasa Indonesia and English are required, with Mandarin/Chinese proficiency being a plus.

title: Legal Administrator
description_text:
Role Description
We are looking for someone to support our Legal & Compliance team by organizing and updating company documents, licenses, and contracts, both in hardcopy and digital form. This role includes labeling and archiving documents, helping with audits and legal reviews, preparing basic legal documents, and providing updates on relevant regulations.

Job Purpose
Maintain and update hardcopies and digital filing system for corproate documents, licenses and contracts.
Ensure accurate labeling and archiving of all legal documents.
Monitor documents retention schedules and assist in document disposal or archiving as per company policy.
Support the legal team in compiling information for audits, reviews or legal due diligence.
Preparing legal documents related to corporate transactions.
Provide regulatory update, compiling information from legal database.

Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Law.
1–2 years of experience in a legal or administrative role is a plus, fresh graduates are welcome to apply
Good understanding of document management and basic legal terms.
Detail-oriented, well-organized, and able to handle confidential information.
Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel).
Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
Able to work independently and as part of a team
Show more Show less

linkedin_org_description:
Accord Innovations Group is a globally recognized talent and technology solutions provider, delivering scalable, people-driven results across seven countries and a client base of over 500 organizations worldwide. We support a wide range of industries, including BFSI, telecom, manufacturing, logistics, IT, healthcare, and retail.

What truly defines us is our belief in people-powered performance, the idea that great outcomes are driven by great teams. We blend this philosophy with deep technical expertise to help clients transform, grow, and stay ahead in a competitive market.

Our Core Services:

Custom Software Development & Digital Transformation
Offshore Delivery & Managed Services
Global IT Consulting and Staffing
Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO)
Business Process Outsourcing (BPO)

We also partner with clients to support the implementation of enterprise tools and systems including:

Server Monitoring & IT Infrastructure Tools
Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Solutions
Application Development Projects
Infrastructure Support & Operations Services

With a presence in the United States, India, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, and Thailand, our global team ensures agility, compliance, and cultural alignment—tailored to each market.

At Accord, we’re not just delivering talent, we’re driving innovation with excellence, every step of the way.
description_text:

title: Junior Legal Counsel

linkedin_org_description:
Discover a hidden beauty in North County with an end-of-the-earth feel and exceptional access to local culture: beach towns, buzzy breweries and endless hikes to burn off indulgences. Verandas open to meandering walkways, mornings on sun-dappled balconies or afternoons spent perfecting your golf game on our Championship course. Après everything by our fireplaces—cocktails, an adventurous wine list or family s’mores.

description_text:
Job Description

Minimum 2 Years

Indonesia, Jakarta Pusat - Midplaza

Jobs Description

Review, draft, and revise a variety of legal documents, including commercial contracts, NDAs, and cooperation agreements
Provide basic legal advice on corporate, employment, and regulatory matters related to manufacturing and trading activities
Conduct legal research on relevant laws and regulations (e.g., labor law, environmental law, trade compliance)
Assist in handling company permits, licenses, and compliance reporting to government institutions (e.g., OSS, BKPM, KLHK)
Support dispute resolution processes, including preparation of supporting documents and coordination with external counsel
Maintain legal documentation, contracts database, and track key dates such as renewals and deadlines
Collaborate with internal departments to ensure compliance with internal policies and applicable regulations

Requirement

A Bachelor’s degree in Law is essential.
No mandatory Master's degree, but it could be an advantage.
Minimum 2–5 years of legal experience, preferably with some initial exposure to a law firm or in-house legal department.
Experience in relevant industry sectors (such as: finance, power, energy, renewable energy, trading, agribusiness, insurance, capital market) is a strong advantage, but not necessarily a requirement for deep expertise.
Solid foundational understanding of core legal principles, particularly in corporate law and contract law.
Basic understanding of legal terminology, processes, and documentation.
Ability to conduct thorough legal research and analyze legal issues under supervision.
Capable of drafting and reviewing routine legal documents (e.g., standard contracts, non-disclosure agreements, legal memos) with supervision.
Familiarity with legal filing systems and document management.
Strong attention to detail and ability to handle confidential information responsibly.
Basic awareness of regulatory compliance requirements relevant to corporate operations.
Ability to identify basic legal risks and escalate them appropriately.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Strong written and verbal communication skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English.
Highly organized, able to manage multiple tasks, and prioritize effectively in a demanding environment.
Proactive, eager to learn, and willing to take initiative.
Professional demeanor, trustworthy, and able to work independently or as part of a team.
Strong interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with colleagues and other departments.
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: The Junior Legal Counsel will review, draft, and revise various legal documents while providing basic legal advice on corporate, employment, and regulatory matters. They will also assist in handling company permits and compliance reporting, support dispute resolution processes, and maintain legal documentation.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree in Law and 2-5 years of legal experience, preferably with exposure to a law firm or in-house legal department. A solid understanding of core legal principles, strong communication skills in both Bahasa Indonesia and English, and the ability to conduct legal research are essential.

description_text:
Job Description

Minimum 2 Years

Indonesia, Jakarta Pusat - Midplaza

Jobs Description

Conducting comprehensive legal research using varioyus databases (e.g., Hukumonline, LexisNexis, Westlaw, internal databases) on a wide range of business law topics, including corporate law, contract law, regulatory compliance (OJK, BEI, industry-specific regulations for finance, digital, energy, mining, trading, etc.), intellectual property, and employment law
Gather and organize factual information, documents, and evidence relevant to cases, transactions, and legal inquiries
Prepare summaries, legal memos, and reports based on research findings, highlighting key points and implications for the legal team
Conduct due diligence support, including reviewing corporate documents, permits, and agreements
Assist in drafting, reviewing, and editing legal documents (e.g., contracts, agreements, business communications, etc.)
Preparing legal forms/templates and legal pleadings (arbitration, litigation, etc.)
Provide administrative and logistical support for litigation, arbitration, and other dispute resolution matters (e.g., organizing exhibits, tracking deadlines, coordinating with external counsel)
Assist in managing the lifecycle of contracts, from drafting and review coordination to execution and archiving
Support legal counsel in various corporate actions (e.g., M&A, restructuring) by organizing documentation and tracking progress
Maintain a calendar of deadlines for legal filings, litigation milestones, and corporate governance events
Assist in monitoring changes in laws and regulations relevant to the company's diverse business lines and prepare summaries for the legal team
Support the Corporate Secretary in preparing materials for Board and Shareholder meetings, including compiling board packs and assisting with meeting logistics
Ensure adherence to internal legal department policies and procedures
Developing and maintaining files, databases and systems to collect, store and retrieve data on litigation, union contracts, patent management, etc.
Assisting Legal Counsel on projects / processes, working independently with limited supervision

Requirement

A Bachelor’s degree in Law is essential
Minimum 2–4 years of legal experience as a Paralegal, Legal Assistant, or Legal Administrator, preferably within a corporate legal department (in-house) or a reputable law firm
Experience in a holding company or an organization with diverse business units is a plus
Expertise in corporate law, regulatory compliance, proficiency in legal research tools and databases (e.g., Hukumonline, regulatory websites, company registries)
Strong command of Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), with advanced skills in Word for document formatting and Excel for data organization
Proficient in legal terminology, corporate legal processes, and common legal documentation
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English
Good understanding of industry-specific regulations, particularly finance/capital market, digital technology business, energy, renewable energy, power, mining, agroforestry, and trading
Strong understanding of industry-specific regulations
Capable of multitasking and prioritizing effectively under deadlines
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: The Paralegal will conduct comprehensive legal research and assist in drafting and reviewing legal documents. They will also provide administrative support for litigation and corporate actions, ensuring adherence to legal department policies.
ai_requirements_summary: Candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree in Law and 2-4 years of legal experience, preferably in a corporate legal department or reputable law firm. Proficiency in legal research tools and strong communication skills in both Bahasa Indonesia and English are essential.

description_text:
Job Description

Minimum 1 Years

Indonesia, Jakarta - Jakarta

Jobs Description

Mengelola administrasi proses rekrutmen, termasuk pengumpulan dan verifikasi CV, input data kandidat ke sistem, dan pelaporan.
Menjadwalkan dan mengoordinasikan proses seleksi seperti wawancara atau psikotes antara kandidat dan user.
Membuat dan mengarsipkan dokumen rekrutmen seperti shortlist kandidat, hasil seleksi, dan form penilaian.
Menjaga kerapian dan kerahasiaan data kandidat sesuai standar HR dan ketentuan perusahaan.
Berkoordinasi dengan tim HR internal, vendor, dan user terkait untuk memastikan kelancaran proses rekrutmen.
Mendukung kebutuhan administratif lainnya yang berkaitan dengan fungsi HR di lingkungan proyek migas.

Requirement

Lulusan S1 Psikologi
Pengalaman sebagai HR Representative / Admin recruitment minimal 1 tahun, khususnya dalam pengelolaan tenaga outsourcing
Mampu mengolah data (Excel, sistem HR, dan pelaporan)
Fasih berbahasa Inggris (lisan dan tulisan) Teliti dan komunikatif
Show more Show less
ai_core_responsibilities: Manage the administration of the recruitment process, including CV collection and verification, data input, and reporting. Coordinate selection processes such as interviews and psychological tests between candidates and users.
ai_requirements_summary: Bachelor's degree in Psychology is required along with at least 1 year of experience as an HR Representative or in recruitment administration, particularly in managing outsourcing personnel. Proficiency in data processing and fluency in English, both written and spoken, are essential.
